body.name: HYTE Y60 Modern Aesthetic Dual Chamber Panoramic Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX Computer Gaming Case with PCIE 4.0 Riser Cable Included, White (CS-HYTE-Y60-BW)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 19 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 19 mins
features: Panoramic Views: No corner pillar. The Y60 features a 3-piece panoramic tempered glass design for the ultimate photo and display potential. See your build the way it was meant to be seen from the left or right side of your desk with a simple turn.
Exclusively Vertical GPU Mounted: Why would you want to see your graphics card any other way.

Included PCIE 4.0 Riser Cable: A protective riser cable canopy integrates beautifully into the case, allowing for half-height PCIE cards behind the throne of the vertical graphics card. The protective shroud is the first of its kind, made specifically for the Y60.
Antechamber Construction: Segment cables from thermal components and turn your PC into a work of art.
Cold Floor Cooling: Eliminate hot spots with sweeping lateral vents from fans tastefully tucked into the basement of the Y60.
Included Fans: The three pre-installed Flow FE12 fans with fluid-dynamic bearings provide whisper-quiet operation.
body.description: See your components the way they were meant to be seen. The Y60 features a 3-piece panoramic tempered glass design for the ultimate photo and display potential and a protective riser cable canopy that integrates beautifully into the case, allowing for half-height PCIE cards behind the throne of the vertical graphics card.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HYTE Y60 Modern Aesthetic Dual Chamber Mid-Tower ATX Computer Gaming Case The Next Evolution in PC Building See your components the way they were meant to be seen. The HYTE Y60 features a 3-piece panoramic tempered glass design for the ultimate photo and display potential and a protective riser cable canopy that integrates beautifully into the case, allowing for half-height PCI-E cards behind the throne of the vertical graphics card. KEY FEATURES Dual Chamber Mid-Tower ATX PC Case Designed for maximum desk appeal showcasing components Bezel-less Panoramic Tempered Glass Included PCIE Gen 4 riser for vertical graphics orientation

Looks Cool, Runs Cooler The Y60's unique airflow path allows for a wide range of compatibility and plenty of cooling options. Modern Aesthetic Design The unique pattern wraps around the case in 3 dimensions and appears to "float" in an impossible way. Cables, Managed The Y60's antechamber design hides unattractive cables, keeping your PC clutter-free visually appealing, and running cool.

Y60 Case Specifications Type Dual Chamber Mid-Tower ATX Case Motherboard Support ITX, mATX, ATX, EATX Case Dimensions 456mm x 285mm x 462mm ( 18 x 11.2 x 18.2 Inches) ( L x W x H) Case Materials ABS, Steel, Tempered Glass Motherboard Support ITX, mATX, ATX, EATX Power Supply ATX up to 235mm in length Video Card Max Dimensions 375mm length, 75mm height (60mm height or less recommended for best cooling) Fan Support Side: 2x 120mm/140mm, Top: 3x 120mm, Rear: 1x 120mm (1x 120mm, 1300 RPM included), Bottom: 2x 120mm/140mm (2x 120mm, 1300 RPM included) Radiator Support Side: 120, 140, 240, 280mm up to 150mm thick, Top: 120, 240, 360mm up to 28mm thick, Rear: 120mm CPU Cooler Height 160 mm Storage 2x 3.5" HDD or 4x 2.5" SSD Expansion Slots 3 + 6 Half-Height I/O Interfaces 2 x Front USB 3.0, 1 x Front USB 3.2 Type C x 1, Audio/Mic Jack x 1 Weight 21.2 Lbs (9.6 kg)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing beautiful case
reviews.reviewText: Really great case. The snow white is amazing. I love the design of it. The angled corner is beautiful. There is plenty of room for your parts to be seen. And they look great. 3 slot cards and tall CPU coolers may not fit so well, so check ahead of time. The assembly isn't too bad. Although there are some nuances, you may have to disassemble things in a certain order to reach the parts properly. It's very heavy as well. I've expected with glass. But the end result is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Merging Form and Function: The HYTE Y60
reviews.reviewText: The HYTE Y60 Modern Aesthetic Dual Chamber Panoramic Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX Computer Case is truly an embodiment of excellent craftsmanship and functionality. As an enthusiast who has used several computer cases over the years, I can confidently state that the HYTE Y60 stands head and shoulders above the rest.One cannot help but marvel at the beauty of this case. The modern aesthetic design, complemented by the panoramic tempered glass, gives it a distinctive look that adds a touch of class to any workspace. The case is not just about looks, however. The superior quality materials used in the construction of the HYTE Y60 ensure its durability and strength.The sturdiness of the case is evident right from the moment you unbox it. Despite its sleek design, it feels solid and well-built, ready to house and protect your valuable components. I am confident that this case will withstand the rigors of daily use and maintain its appearance for years to come.From a practical perspective, the HYTE Y60 is a dream to work with. Its dual chamber design allows for a clean build and easy cable management. Furthermore, the case offers a plethora of airflow options, letting you optimize the cooling setup to match your components. This design feature ensures that the case can keep up with even the most demanding hardware configurations.Above all, what sets the HYTE Y60 apart is how it successfully combines aesthetics with functionality. It’s a case that catches the eye while delivering top-notch performance. I've had several computer cases in the past, but none have impressed me as much as the HYTE Y60.In conclusion, the HYTE Y60 Modern Aesthetic Dual Chamber Panoramic Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX Computer Case is a remarkable piece of hardware. Whether you're building a new system or upgrading your current setup, the HYTE Y60 is a worthwhile investment that won't disappoint. It's not just the best case I've ever owned; I'd go as far as to say it could very well be the best case on the market right now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build in and looks great
reviews.reviewText: I bought this case for my new gaming PC. I’m very pleased with the build quality, airflow, ease to build in of this case. I decided to go air cooled GPU and CPU and have had zero issues with temperature, everything is running nice and cool (I added two intake fans when building on the side mount just to be safe). Cable management is no problem, just remember to install all of the connections on the bottom of your motherboard so you don’t have to pull the GPU back out to add a USB connector. Remember that the GPU is vertically mounted which will obstruct the lower PCIe slots on your motherboard if you intend to add a wireless card, sound card, capture cards, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This case had plenty of space to do a build plus side mounting the GPU looks amazing I will definitely be buying another one of these cases to build my next computer in value for money you get exactly what is described great for cable management plenty of space holds a 4070 to 4090 no problem with room to spare I have highly recommended this case to several of my friends who are looking to build a PC

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great case for liquid system
reviews.reviewText: Super nice case, quality put together, thoughtful features. Super clean cable management. The case is designed for liquid cool system. GPU sits really close to the glass and if its air cooled its going to get hot and fans will be working full speed all around. I have an AIO CPU cooler and air cooled gpu, it runs the fans full speed. Wish the case allowed horizontal GPU mounting as that would help out A LOT. It has half sized ports for other expansion cards so if you wanted to mount it horizontally chances are your GPU wont fit and have something to mount it to. These days most people aren't putting in expansion cards. i also, wish the riser cable was PCie gen 5. but other than that, the case is super clean! really shows off your components. The usb on the front is in a great location too. Its a big beefy case!
Una chulada este gabinete, el único inconveniete es si pones un ventilador arriba de 360, cuesta un poco ponerlo. de ahí en fuera, todo perfecto
Definitely love the loosYou can install the screen module on the side, or wait for the y70 with an integrated touch screenEither way 🔥 pc case

reviews.reviewTitle: El Gabinete Perfecto: Elegancia, Funcionalidad y Personalización en Cada Detalle
reviews.reviewText: Este gabinete no solo destaca por su apariencia encantadora y elegante, sino que también impresiona por su generoso tamaño y amplitud. Su diseño espacioso proporciona un entorno ideal para ensamblar y organizar los componentes de manera eficiente, ofreciendo no solo estética, sino también funcionalidad.Una de las características notables de este gabinete es la presencia de filtros de polvo fácilmente removibles, lo que simplifica considerablemente la tarea de mantenimiento y limpieza. Esta funcionalidad no solo contribuye a mantener un entorno interno limpio y libre de polvo, sino que también prolonga la vida útil de los componentes internos al garantizar un flujo de aire eficiente.Otro aspecto que me ha agradado enormemente es la versatilidad que ofrece en términos de refrigeración. La capacidad para incorporar varios ventiladores permite personalizar y optimizar el sistema de enfriamiento de acuerdo con las necesidades específicas. Esta flexibilidad es esencial para mantener temperaturas adecuadas y garantizar un rendimiento óptimo, especialmente en entornos de alto rendimiento.Además, la posibilidad de decidir la ubicación de la tarjeta de video es un toque adicional que demuestra la atención al detalle en el diseño de este gabinete. Esta característica no solo brinda opciones de personalización, sino que también facilita la gestión del cableado y contribuye a una estética ordenada.En resumen, este gabinete ha superado mis expectativas y ha sido una elección que no solo resalta por su belleza y elegancia, sino también por su funcionalidad, facilidad de mantenimiento y capacidad de adaptación a diversas necesidades de hardware. ¡Definitivamente, una adición excepcional a mi configuración!

reviews.reviewTitle: The front usb plug ins didn't work
reviews.reviewText: I don't know if it was my problem with my assembly or the product but the usb plug ins for the front of the pc didn't work? I mean it's fine rn cause I don't really use the front plug ins but it would be better if it worked. Contemplating if it's worth sending back for just keeping.
